name: Pub 13
description:
This game was made for a game jam that was part of the year 1 introduction week for the HKU Games & Interaction. The time limit for this game jam was 5 hours. The team consisted of 7 different people with varying levels of experience. Ranging from beginner to advanced.

How to play:

  1. Check on the right what the customer wants
  2. Check on the left how to make it
  3. Make it
  4. Check it
  5. Repeat

How to quit:

Alt + F4
